overview:
I’m into hosting the travelers in Tokyo through some websites. And I have my pages to share the experiences of hosting and Japanese things to the world!

I am holding the events of intercultural exchanges with local people in Japan & foreigners in Japan in the activity of “Japanize!”. Please check the FB page below.

http://www.facebook.com/pages/Japanize/415425035158855 http://www.facebook.com/couchsurfing.jp
